text: James Paige Morrison (born April 21, 1954) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as CTU Director Bill Buchanan on 24. He was born in Bountiful, Utah. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Showing Up Movie * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American atheists Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Utah
title: James Morrison (actor)
